00001 #include <algorithm>
00002 #include <cmath>
00003 
00004 #include <HistogrammPT.h>
00005 
00006 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00007 bool HistogrammPT::AxisRange::set(const MinMaxRange<double> &_lim,
00008                                   double _step){
00009 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00010   step = _step;
00011   n = 0;
00012 
00013   if(_lim.min > _lim.max){
00014     cout<<"Range Error "<<lim.min<<" "<<lim.max<<endl;
00015     return false;
00016   }
00017 
00018   lim.min = _lim.min - step;
00019   n = (unsigned)((_lim.max - lim.min)/step + 3);
00020   n = max(n, (unsigned)4);
00021   lim.max = lim.min + n * step;
00022   return true;
00023 }
00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 bool HistogrammPT::Book(const MinMaxRange<double> &p_lim,
00026                         const MinMaxRange<double> &t_lim,
00027                         double _step) {
00028 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029   if( !p.set(p_lim, _step) || !t.set(t_lim, _step) )
00030     return false;
00031   c_count = p.n * t.n;
00032   c = new HCell[c_count];
00033 
00034   for(unsigned p_i = 0; p_i < p.n; p_i++)
00035     for(unsigned t_i = 0; t_i < t.n; t_i++){
00036       HCell &pc = *get_by_index(p_i, t_i);
00037       pc.p_i = p_i;
00038       pc.t_i = t_i;
00039       pc.val = 0.;
00040     }
00041   return true;
00042 }
00043 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 HistogrammPT::HCell *HistogrammPT::get(const Sphere3D &sp){
00045 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00046   unsigned idx_p = p.idx(sp.p), idx_t = t.idx(sp.t);
00047   if((idx_p >= p.n) || (idx_t >= t.n)){
00048     cerr<<"Histogram:Fill: Out of range!"<<endl;
00049     return 0;
00050   }
00051   return &(c[idx_p * t.n + idx_t]);
00052 }
